text: Hi there :wave:  I am new to HubSpot and I work with a marketing department at my company as a web admin. Glad to be here!
Hello~ Everyone! I'm new to HubSpot. I work primarily as a React-Developer and Product Designer and been learning to use the conversation SDK for implementation into products. :slightly_smiling_face:

:wave-yeti:  Hello all! I’m an app developer (React Native) mostly - but we (SaaS app) have just joined the HS Startup program and about to embark on a new website, lots of automations and tonnes more. Looking forward to getting my teeth into HubSpot again, it’s been a while (although I am still a Community Champion from 18 months ago I think!)

Hi <@U02PJR4PNBC>
Happy to connect :wave: I guess it must be super excited to work on the first theme and the academy course at the same time. I’ve just finished mine and looking forward for the results on my practicum.
If you need any help happy to chat :relaxed:

Hi Anthony,
Welcome to the community :wave:
Hi Olia, thank you for the warm welcome :slightly_smiling_face:
